artist: Engraver: Johanna Sibylla Kusel; Delineator: Sébastien Le Clerc; Publisher: Jeremias Wolff
description: a battle scene within an elaborate frame; tree right foreground with people in tree and around base of tree; armies and smoke in field beyond; below scene in frame a map; above scene in frame an oval cartouche with castle on top
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

in plate in black in frame: [ LA BATAILLE DE GRAN OU DE VIFALU/ LE SIEGE DE/ NEAISEL/ Sebastian le Clerc del    Jeremias wolf excud. Aug. Vind.   Johanna Sibilla Krausin fec.]; on verso in pencil: [1-281]
title: La Bataille de Gran Ou de Vifalu
